snippet.title: Arcade Game: Zzyzzyxx (1982  Cinematronics)
snippet.description:
A maze game where you move ZZYZZYXX up and down horizontal rows of alternating moving bricks to gather presents which will satisfy his love. Lola -- whose affection is not easily captured. ZZYZZYXX's vulnerability increases (as he collects gifts, as well as points) not only because of Lola's untouchable attitude, but because of obstacles such as rattifers trying to put an end to ZZYZZYXX's quest for Lola's love and affection.

This game is also known as "Brix".

Note: Invincibility cheat was used when down to last life. The game is endless.
